amendatorysection.catchline: Ordinances; resolutions; regulations; force and effect.
amendatorysection.para: All valid ordinances, resolutions, orders or other regulations of a city, or any authorized body or official thereof, existing at the time sections 19-601 to 19-648 become applicable to the city, and not inconsistent with their provisions, shall continue in full force and effect until amended, repealed or otherwise superseded.
